name: Georgian Pine Investments
overview: Georgian Pine Investments is primarily focused on investments in the telecom, media and technology sectors in China. Georgian Pine’s Partners have been involved with starting leading media companies like Columbia Pictures Asia and backing successful technology companies including: Atheros Communications (Nasdaq: ATHR), Epinions (eBay), Onebox (OPWV) and Shawei (Tom Group).

funding_round.source_description: LINGTU SECURES US$30 MILLION IN NEW FUNDING Gobi Partners Leads Oversubscribed Round
